data.eml:eml: Catalogue of the family Ologamasidae Ryke (Acari: Mesostigmata)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Castilho, Raphael C., Silva, Edmilson S., De, Gilberto J., Halliday, Bruce (2016): Catalogue of the family Ologamasidae Ryke (Acari: Mesostigmata). Zootaxa 4197 (1): 1-147, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.168445
